name: Asteroid (*),
description:
I am following a YouTuber's example of Asteroid, it starts as an exact copy I guess, but then he shows how to put a spin on it , but when I get to that part I'll put my own different from his, and then for those who are aware of the GB Studio, I'm going to recreate it for Gameboy Color.

*added download:

Controls:

Left, Right and Up = movement,

SPACE = Shoot

Credit goes to: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCn7FE3Tx391g1tWPv-1tv7Q

a.k.a. Shaun Spalding for Tutorial, My game when finished will be different.
